name: boxed bliss ~ curl up with a bottle of wine
description:
Need a quick gift? No problem!

Although our main focus is on creating custom gifts, we do stock a few popular boxes.

This box contains:
One Lands Downunder Herringbone Charcoal Throw Blanket
One Swissmar Wine Bottle Stopper
One Metrokane Rabbit Wine Opener and Foil Cutter
One Bottle of Wine (Valued at $30)

Please note that wine in picture is not included.  Price includes a $30 bottle of wine.  Please email your wine request to kassie@blissdesigns.ca or indicate that you would like us to select your wine.

Delivery available in the Greater Vancouver Area (Delivery Included)

description:

51" x 67"
50% Cotton 50% Soft Acrylic. 
Made in Italy.

name: compagnie de provence ~ 1L liquid soap refill
description:
This pure liquid soap from Marseille is made according to old world tradition and contains 72% vegetable oils. This soap is biodegradable and free of any artificial colouring. Gentle on hands and great for frequent use.

Delivery available within the Greater Vancouver Area at this time.  Please email me to arrange a pick up kassie@blissdesigns.ca

Approximately 15 hours of burn time.

name: barking bliss - organic peanut butter pumpkin treats
description:
Organic peanut butter and pumpkin treats.  These treats are made using all human grade organic ingredients.  Order includes one dozen treats (approx. 1.5")

Ingredients include the following:
- Organic Whole Wheat Flour
- Organic Eggs
- Organic Pumpkin
- Organic Peanut Butter
- Organic Sea Salt
- Organic Cinnamon

I recommend storing the treats in an airtight container to help preserve them.  The self life is approximately 3 weeks, however they are usually long gone before then!

$1 from every dozen ordered will be donated to the WBBR - Without Borders Boxer Rescue www.wbbr.ca  

Treats come bagged, however gift boxes are available upon request.  Delivery is only available in Canada.  Pick up can be arranged if requested.

Every dog is different, therefore I welcome custom orders. Please email me for more details kassie@blissdesigns.ca

name: barking bliss - organic croutons
description:
Organic croutons for your furry friend!  These crunchy treats are packed full of flavour.  Great for training treats, as they are small bite size pieces.  Order includes 6oz of treats (approx. three slices of bread cubed)

Ingredients include the following:
- Organic Flour Free Bread
- Organic Olive Oil
- Organic Chicken Broth
- Organic Parmesan Cheese

I recommend refrigerating the treats in an airtight container to help preserve them.  The self life is approximately 3 weeks, however they are usually long gone before then!

$1 from every package ordered will be donated to the WBBR - Without Borders Boxer Rescue www.wbbr.ca  

Treats come bagged, however gift boxes are available upon request.  Delivery is only in Canada.  Pick up can be arranged if requested.

Every dog is different, therefore I welcome custom orders. Please email me for more details kassie@blissdesigns.ca

name: organic CANUCKS sugar cookies
description:
GO CANUCKS GO!!

These organic sugar cookies will be a hit any party!  Made with high quality organic ingredients and real vanilla bean they are as delicious as they look!

Perfect for a playoff party, or birthday party favour!

A minimum of 12 cookies is required per order. 

Each cookie is individually cello bagged and tied with your choice of ribbon.  Colors can be customized to your liking.  You will receive an email with the details once order is received.

Delivery only available in the Greater Vancouver Area at this time. 

Please contact me for a list of full ingredients if required.

name: organic melting moments - 1 dozen
description:
The recipe for Melting Moments has been passed down in my family for generations and is one of my personal favourites.  I will always remember making these with my mom growing up.

Melting Moments are a type of shortbread cookie that literally melts in your mouth as you eat them.  I use buttercream icing in the centre to add the perfect amount of sweetness.

An order of one dozen cookies come in one Bliss Box.  Be sure to add additional boxes to your cart if you would like your order to be split into multiple boxes.  

Delivery information will be emailed to you after order is received, so be sure to check your email.  Delivery only available in the Greater Vancouver Area at this time.

Custom orders are available, please email me for more information kassie@blissdesigns.ca
